name: Softlocked
description:
A short game about locking yourself from progressing to progress.

Controls:

Arrow Keys / A and D = Move left and right

Space / Up key / W = Jump

Enter / Backspace / Delete = Reset

Secrets

Fill in the blank to get a special word.
If then type the letters of this words from left to right in the game,
you'll play a accidental version of the main theme!

When you drink too much alcohol, you're _ _ _ _ _.

Also if you type NOT in a simiral way it will reset the song to default.

Holding down the letters G and O, then pressing either a number on the numpad or a letter from the two previous secrets, will transfer you to a specific level.

numpad goes to normal levels, letters go to secret levels.

And finally, the most important one of them all, if you press alt you change color.
